nodes.label: ctx . accounts . plot . holder = ctx . accounts . farmer . key () ;
ctx . accounts . plot . state = PlotState :: Empty ;

for _ in 0 .. days { ctx . accounts . worker . stamina = ctx . accounts . worker . stamina . saturating_sub (1) ; ctx . accounts . tally . days = ctx . accounts . tally . days . saturating_add (1) ; ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint = ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint . saturating_add (ctx . accounts . plot . fertility as u64) ; }
ctx . accounts . worker . stamina = ctx . accounts . worker . stamina . saturating_sub (1) ;
ctx . accounts . tally . days = ctx . accounts . tally . days . saturating_add (1) ;
ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint = ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint . saturating_add (ctx . accounts . plot . fertility as u64) ;

if ctx . accounts . worker . stamina < 50 { ctx . accounts . plot . state = PlotState :: Empty ; ctx . accounts . worker . boots = 0 ; ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint = ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint . saturating_add (3) ; msg ! ("tired; pause planting") ; } else { ctx . accounts . plot . state = PlotState :: Planted ; ctx . accounts . worker . boots = 1 ; ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint = ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint . saturating_add (1) ; msg ! ("steady cultivation") ; }
ctx . accounts . plot . state = PlotState :: Empty ;
ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint = ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint . saturating_add (3) ;
ctx . accounts . plot . state = PlotState :: Planted ;
ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint = ctx . accounts . tally . yield_hint . saturating_add (1) ;
